## Stats interface

Simple statistics about the values in an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Stats 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [avg](./harp-mapview.stats.avg.md) | number | The average duration of all values in the array. |
|  [max](./harp-mapview.stats.max.md) | number | The highest value in the array. |
|  [median](./harp-mapview.stats.median.md) | number | The median duration of all values in the array. |
|  [median75](./harp-mapview.stats.median75.md) | number | The 75th percentile median of all values in the array. |
|  [median90](./harp-mapview.stats.median90.md) | number | The 90th percentile median of all values in the array. |
|  [median95](./harp-mapview.stats.median95.md) | number | The 95th percentile median of all values in the array. |
|  [median97](./harp-mapview.stats.median97.md) | number | The 97th percentile median of all values in the array. |
|  [median99](./harp-mapview.stats.median99.md) | number | The 99th percentile median of all values in the array. |
|  [median999](./harp-mapview.stats.median999.md) | number | The 99.9th percentile median of all values in the array. |
|  [min](./harp-mapview.stats.min.md) | number | The lowest value in the array. |
|  [numSamples](./harp-mapview.stats.numsamples.md) | number | The number of values in the array. |
